briefdescription.para: Creates a collision body for a specified object, object can be null if using for things like environment or invisible walls @NOTE: The owning object will be used to call OnCollision function
Applies camera shake @NOTE: This overwrites the previous camera shake

memberdef.argsstring: (float damageAmount, gef::Vector4 origin, float innerRadius, float outerRadius)
memberdef.name: ApplyRadialDamage

memberdef.argsstring: (gef::Mesh *mesh=nullptr, gef::Vector4 translation=gef::Vector4::kZero, gef::Vector4 rotation=gef::Vector4::kZero, gef::Vector4 scale=gef::Vector4::kOne, WorldObject *owner=nullptr)
memberdef.name: SpawnMeshActor

briefdescription.para: Spawns a MeshActor into the scene and gets it ready for rendering and updating
Spawns a SpriteActor into the scene and gets it ready for rendering and updating
